then try running "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" (do it from a console -- you can switch to one by pressing Ctrl+Alt+F1).
after that, run "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart" to restart X, and see if it comes back to life.

yes, if your Grub menu doesn't show up by default. start hitting it like crazy as soon as the BIOS is almost going to pass control to the bootloader, and a menu will pop up
nv is an open source driver for NVidia card. "nvidia" is the official closed-source driver from NVidia. the latter is faster for 3D acceleration.
